comment.author: 69005233@N00
comment._content: Youve got this titled and mapped as being in Chicago, but it's Boston.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi, Brenda Anderson! Thanks for catching this misidentification. You are correct, of course. That is the Custom House Tower in Boston, not the customs house in Chicago. We will work to correct the descriptive information for this image.

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
